summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4031 for the improvement of the alley in block 50, replat of Pontius' 2nd Addition, Supplemental, being the alley east of and parallel with Summit Avenue, from East Howell street to East Denny Way, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48787, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
